stimulusHtml: The total cost, in dollars, to order x units of a certain product is modeled by C(x)=7x2+252. According to the model, for what size order is the cost per unit a minimum?
choicesHtml: An order of 1 unit has a minimum cost per unit.
An order of 6 units has a minimum cost per unit.
An order of 84 units has a minimum cost per unit.
An order of 252 units has a minimum cost per unit.
